of 23

Every year, the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic takes place in New York City, inviting polo-lovers and all-around fashionistas and fashionistos to watch a polo match and enjoy a day of picknicking in Liberty Sate Park. Thanks to social media, the annual event has become a #Blackmoment, where everywhere comes dressed in their Sunday best. And whether you’re there or not, you’ll spend a lot of time just scramming through the gram, getting your life from these looks. And honestly, the flicks are amazing. There’s a bit of church, a dash of brunch, and a whole lot of Black excellence. Hands down, it’s the best place to catch some dope fashion looks while sitting out on the lawn, sipping on your champagne. And I love any event that turns into a Black family reunion! If you need some fashion inspo for the summer, just look at these fire fits spotted this weekend at the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic sponsored by Hublot.

https://www.instagram.com/p/Bjih2KJg1-KjNmZLmKLcfiQetNBeieZ4HXLXHQ0/ This stylista gave us a case for all pink this summer in this fabulous pantsuit, paired with sneakers to keep it calm and casual-yet-glam on the lawn. Oh, and these cheetah sunglasses? Fierce!

https://www.instagram.com/p/BjinwvKBf12/?tagged=vcpoloclassic This stylista gave us floral-themed goodness for the day, pairing a beautiful purple floral dress with some pink flowers.

https://www.instagram.com/p/BjlAihhAmbP/?tagged=vcpoloclassic This fashion-savvy duo popped out in frills and a two-piece set (which is also by the poppin’ Black designer, Fenoel.) Which is your favorite look? I can’t choose!

View this post on Instagram Drink Good, Live Well™️ . . . #VCPoloClassic #CliquotStyle #RoséGarden #DrinkGoodLiveWell A post shared by Maxine Lee (@livegoodwithmax) on Jun 3, 2018 at 7:26am PDT I LOVE PINK. This hot pink number has a low plunging neckline and a thigh slit, perfect for a summer night out with your friends or even date night with your boo. This dress is a lewwwwk.

View this post on Instagram #VeuveClicquotPoloClassic 🍾 A post shared by The Non-Influencer (@jaidus) on Jun 2, 2018 at 4:46pm PDT This green pantsuit looked so chic and dapper on this fashionisto, who gave us color for the summer and spring. I never thought I’d like a green pantsuit as much as this, but I am diggin’ this vibe.

View this post on Instagram 🏇🏾🥂 A post shared by ♔Jamaican Canadian♔ (@winnieharlow) on Jun 2, 2018 at 3:52pm PDT Oh, and don’t get it twisted: Celebs come out to the function as well! The beautiful Winnie Harlow was spotted in New York, sporting off those long legs in this dope fit. Winnie never disappoints!

https://www.instagram.com/p/BjlCwuCH0FK/ This boss babe wore this beautiful pastel, off-the-shoulder flowy dress, decked out with some nude heels and a matching nude purse.

https://www.instagram.com/p/BjlMAJgHb_h/ Even the men came out in their full fits for the polo event! This all-white fit is absolutely dapper, and paired with an orange linen blazer? Yes, Black king. YAAASS.

View this post on Instagram Today was a beautiful day at the polo! 🐎🏑🏆 A post shared by faroukjames (@faroukjames) on Jun 3, 2018 at 10:11am PDT Even the kids came to slay! Farouk James came in this dapper polo fit, and with all that flowy hair? This is a model pose. Put it on a cover!

View this post on Instagram 2018 Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic 🍾 #veuveclicquot #veuveclicquotpoloclassic #blackexcellence #style #fashion A post shared by 🗣 Speak Life (@forever_mistah) on Jun 2, 2018 at 9:05pm PDT These men look so chic in their fits. This all-white LV-esque fit is fire, but also this two-piece set is giving me everything for that beautiful, green lawn. Also everyone had one of these fab yellow umbrellas, and now I’m wondering where I can get one.

View this post on Instagram Champagne & Polo #veuveclicquotpoloclassic #vcpoloclassic A post shared by The Artisan Unique (@amorunique__) on Jun 3, 2018 at 7:45am PDT This look is honestly something so unexpected to me, and that’s why I love it! Who says you can’t pair metallics with non-metallics, or that something with a bit of gold can’t go with silver? Fashion is whatever you want it to be, shine girl!

View this post on Instagram A lovely day to visit the grounds. #VCpoloclassic #goodvibes #summertime A post shared by Brie (@briepyt) on Jun 3, 2018 at 6:51am PDT How mesmerizing is this African-print sundress? Not only is it a super simple fit that can easily be dressed up and down, but it’s just…such an understated statement-maker. This Queen brought it home!

View this post on Instagram Bubble gum 🍭 🍬 #vcpoloclassic #fashion A post shared by J'Lysa (@jlysa_monet) on Jun 2, 2018 at 6:13pm PDT I promise, no more pink suits, but I told y’all it’s a vibe! This longline linen pantsuit is a look that you can wear with the blazer, or you can pair the blazer with some nude heels and wear it as a dress (or maybe some pants underneath.) Love everything about the pink suits coming out to play!

View this post on Instagram Brown Sugar Champagne Mamí x Clicquot Rosé ✨🍾💕 #VCPoloClassic #VeuveClicquotPoloClassic A post shared by Brittany 👑 (@britshaniece) on Jun 2, 2018 at 5:55pm PDT Last but certainly not least, this curvy stylista gave the gram BODY in this super cute yellow two-piece frilly set. Just goes to show that you can rock whatever you want, because nobody can tell me she doesn’t look bomb!
